UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: You are the Mountain and you worship Earth. Deep into the tunnels, covered in clay and dust, you've found your path. In the darkness, you've found light. And now you shall bring that darkness all over the surface.

UnitType.Description: Use scouts to explore the world.
